DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind study evaluate efficacy tolerability allogeneic human adipose derived stem cell component extract androgenic alopecia relatively healthy adult . A total 38 subject receive 1.2 g allogeneic human adipose derive stem cell component extract per month placebo 16 week .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Allogeneic Human Adipose Derived Stem Cell Component Extract Androgenic Alopecia
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind study evaluate efficacy tolerability allogeneic human adipose derived stem cell component extract androgenic alopecia relatively healthy adult . A total 38 subject receive 1.2 g allogeneic human adipose derive stem cell component extract per month placebo 16 week . Hair count thickness primary outcome .
DOC.criteria: androgenic alopecia basic specific ( BASP ) classification : M2 , C2 , U1 , V1 , F1 high patient scalp disease
